dmca.title: [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Childerstone, Dave [mailto:Dave.Childerstone@bourne-leisure.co.uk] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 01, 2006 7:10 AM
To: legal-response2@theplanet.com
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.]
Importance: High



To Whom it May concern

Further to your reply below, please can you reopen this case, and compare
the site currently hosted at  <http://www.cricketwildlifepark.co.uk>
http://www.cricketwildlifepark.co.uk with the archive site in this link
which shows an old version of the official website for Cricket St Thomas
Wildlife Park
<http://web.archive.org/web/20011128215653/http://www.cstwp.co.uk/>
http://web.archive.org/web/20011128215653/http://www.cstwp.co.uk/

It is clear that the registrant has stolen the entire screen to create his
site in an effort to promote his site artificially using our Intellectual
Property and trading on our business name in order to attract visitors.

To make things worse the registrant is hosting links to pornographic
websites on a webpage designed for and intended to be visited by minors.

I am convinced therefore that this site contravenes your AUP on several
counts and ask that you suspend this domain with immediate effect while we
initiate legal action against the registrant to release this domain name,
and also enter dispute procedures with Nominet for the same reasons as
outlined above.

I look forward to your assistance and an early resolution to this
unfortunate situation

Regards

Dave Childerstone
Technical Projects Manager
Bourne Leisure Limited




-----Original Message-----
From: Nicks, Dan
Sent: 01 February 2006 12:11
To: Childerstone, Dave
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.]




-----Original Message-----
From: Legal Response [mailto:legal-response2@theplanet.com]
Sent: 31 January 2006 17:27
To: Nicks, Dan
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.]

 To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.

Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
Sent: Monday, January 30, 2006 12:23 PM
To: Dan.Nicks@bourne-leisure.co.uk; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:        [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.
Date:   Mon, 30 Jan 2006 15:46:06 -0000
From:   Nicks, Dan <Dan.Nicks@bourne-leisure.co.uk>
To:     <abuse@theplanet.com>



This domain seems to be hosted by you.



It is masquerading as our Zoo park Web site, Taking actual Text from our
pages.

As can be see there are Porn links lower down.

Please shut this site down now.



Many Thanks;

/*/Dan Nicks/*//*/.   /*//*/United Kingdom/*/

Tel: (01442) 20-3870

Mobile: (07714) 836-963




______________________________________________________________________
This email has been scanned by the MessageLabs Email Security System. For
more information please visit http://www.messagelabs.com/email
______________________________________________________________________

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
